    • Constructor Detail

      • GeniusStrategy

        public GeniusStrategy()
        Creates a new strategy with name Rutger/Tariq. This is the best strategy implemented.

      • GeniusStrategy

        public GeniusStrategy(int time)
        Creates a new strategy with name Rutger/Tariq. This is the best strategy implemented. Has a maximum thinking time in seconds, if it runs out of time, it returns the move that smart strategy would have given.
        Parameters:
        time, - maximum thinking time in seconds.

    • Method Detail

      • setThinkTime

        public void setThinkTime(int t)
        Sets the maximum thinking time of this strategy.
        Parameters:
        t - maximum time in seconds.

        public int determineMove(Board board,
                         Mark mark)
        Description copied from interface: Strategy
        Determines a move in xy-plane for a given mark on a board.
        Specified by:
        determineMove in interface Strategy
        mark - of player that should make a move
        Returns:
        index of the field the move should be made on.

      • valueBoardMark

        public double valueBoardMark(Board board,
                             Mark mark)
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Calculates the value of the board/mark combination, taking all possible opponent moves into account
        Parameters:
        board, - current board
        mark, - mark to play.
        Returns:
        value of the board, between -1.0 and 1.0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
